Package uk.ac.uea.activityprogram.Controllers

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivitiesCalendar
    The UEA activities calendar, extends the Base Calendar allowing to have a calendar interface with several views.
    ActivityMemento
    Created by Kristiana on 12/01/2016.
    AppDBHandler
    This extends the framework DatabaseHandler class to create a database for this application and allow manipulation and creation of new tables specific to this application.
    BaseCalendar
    This is a base activity which contains week view and all the codes necessary to initialize the week view for the calendar.
    HomeScreen
    HomeScreen Activity - the screen user sees once they are logged into the app.
    Login
    The login class for the app, Manages what needs to be imported from the database for a user and checks if a user exists.
    MainActivity
    The main activity that is seen when user starts the app Manage the loading of the events from an online storage location and read them in, store in an arraylist.
    Register
    Registration class for the app.
    Settings_Activity
    Settings activity which manages the users settings.
    UserCalendar
    The user calendar, extends the Base Calendar allowing to have a calendar interface with several views.
